message: I propose we divide the money with an 80/20 split in favor of you, Bob. Let me know if this works for you.
I think it's fair to reverse the split from last round, as the value of the money decreases for you more quickly. Let's see if you agree.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 64/36 split in your favor, Bob. This maintains some balance while accounting for the diminishing value of the money for me. Let's see if this is acceptable.
